Package view

Class ManagerHomePageView

java.lang.Object
view.abstracts.ARenderView
view.ManagerHomePageView
All Implemented Interfaces:
view.interfaces.ViewHelperInterface, view.interfaces.ViewInterface
public class ManagerHomePageView extends view.abstracts.ARenderView
ManagerHomePageView class is responsible for rendering the manager view, prompting the manager to select the options he/she wants to display. This class extends the abstract base view classARenderView

  • Constructor Details

    • ManagerHomePageView

      public ManagerHomePageView(ManagerController managerCon)
      Constructs a new ManagerHomePageView object with ManagerController dependency.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • renderApp

      public void renderApp(int selection)
      Overrided method to display various options and navigates to the specified case based on manager input. The renderApp method renders different aspects of the application based on the selection parameter.
      Parameters:
      selection - The view to navigate to. The valid selection are:
      • 0: Invoke the features in the Manager Main Page.
      • 1: Invoke the features to perform the tasks of the staff.
      • 2: Invoke the features to process an order.
      • 3: Invoke the features to edit the menu textfile.
      • 4: Invoke the features to edit the particular item.

    • renderChoice

      public void renderChoice()
      Overrided method to print the options in the Manager Main Page.

    • renderStaffChoice

      public void renderStaffChoice()
      Method to print the options of what the staff can do and to navigate back to the Manager Main Page.

    • renderProcessChoice

      public void renderProcessChoice()
      Method to print the options for processing an order and to navigate back to the Staff Home Page.

    • renderOption

      public void renderOption()
      Method to print the options for editing the menu textfile and to navigate back to the Manager Home Page.

    • renderEdit

      public void renderEdit()
      Method to print the options for modifying a particular item and to navigate back to editing the menu textfile.

      public void displayOrder()
      Method to print the message when displaying new orders.

      Method to print the headings when displaying the order details.

    • displayBranchStaff

      public void displayBranchStaff(List<model.abstracts.AEmployee> employees)
      Method to display the list of staffs and their roles from the branch that the manager is in.
      Parameters:
      employees - The list of staffs in the same branch as the manager.

    • displayNotFound

      public void displayNotFound()
      Method to display the message when an item is not found and delay for 3 seconds before returning back to edit the menu textfile.
